Farewell My Concubine

Ano: 1993

IMDb ID: tt0106332

Classificação: 8.1

Sinopse: "Farewell, My Concubine" is a movie with two parallel, intertwined stories. It is the story of two performers in the Beijing Opera, stage brothers, and the woman who comes between them. At the same time, it attempts to do no less than squeeze the entire political history of China in the twentieth century into a three-hour timeframe.—Michael Kim
